//============================================================================= // StaticMeshActor. // An actor that is drawn using a static mesh(a mesh that never changes, and // can be cached in video memory, resulting in a speed boost). //=============================================================================
Source Code

00002	// StaticMeshActor.
00003	// An actor that is drawn using a static mesh(a mesh that never changes, and
00004	// can be cached in video memory, resulting in a speed boost).

00007	class StaticMeshActor extends Actor

00009		placeable;
00010	
00011	defaultproperties
00012	{
00013	     bStatic=True
00014	     bWorldGeometry=True
00015	     bAcceptsProjectors=True
00016	     bInteractive=False

00019	     bBlockActors=True
